text: - Hi y'all. It's me Paula.

or
somebody,

So anyway, it's good.

And we're gonna start

and a half a cup of solid shortening.
And we're just gonna cream that up.

It's a very simple,

add the flour and the milk.

Alternately, we're gonna

and we're going to end with our flour.
